testsuite.name: GET /users/{id}/profile

testcase.name: should return 403 PROFILE_PRIVATE when profile is private for this viewer
should return public profile to anonymous viewer (auth fails, requesterId = all-zeros)
should return public profile when authenticated viewer requests it
should return 404 PROFILE_NOT_FOUND when user profile does not exist
